sense.def:
To glimpse something
pomeni nekaj videti zelo na kratko in ne preveč dobro.

seg.quote: ...a village they had glimpsed through the trees.
...the first glimpse I caught of Fanny.

sense.def:
Izraz
to glimpse something
lahko uporabimo tudi takrat, ko nekaj na kratko doživimo ali na nekaj pomislimo in začnemo tisto bolje razumeti.

seg.quote: She glimpses something of what life ought to be about.
